rooms.description: A spacious entrance lobby designed with a Mediterranean aesthetic, featuring elegant stone finishes and wood accents. Includes wheelchair-accessible features like a ramp entry.
The living room is designed with Mediterranean style, incorporating open spaces, light color palettes, and natural materials. It includes an integrated wheelchair-accessible seating area.
A Mediterranean-style dining space with a central table and built-in seating that accommodates wheelchair accessibility. Vastu principles ensure optimal energy flow.
A dedicated home office space designed with Mediterranean accents, featuring ample natural light and ergonomic furniture. The room layout adheres to Vastu guidelines for productivity.
A quiet library area with bookshelves, comfortable seating, and Mediterranean decor. The design ensures smooth wheelchair access and proper lighting in accordance with Vastu.
A cozy bedroom reflecting Mediterranean style, complete with natural ventilation and energy-efficient design. The layout follows Vastu guidelines for restful sleep.
A modern bathroom designed to be wheelchair accessible with grab bars and non-slip flooring. Mediterranean design elements are blended with local building norms.
A Mediterranean kitchen that is wheelchair friendly, featuring ergonomic counter heights and accessible appliances. Vastu principles guide the placement of water and fire elements.

openings.location_description: Centered on the southern facade to ensure positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Multiple windows placed strategically for natural light and ventilation, ensuring alignment with Vastu guidelines.
Internal doors are designed to be wheelchair accessible with wider openings.
